job_details.Functieomschrijving:
In the role of Conversational AI developer you're part of a team that strives for the best customer-experience in online banking contact. You'll be part of an environment that heavily focusses on innovation by means of cutting-edge technologies, such as Generative AI! Together, you'll be responsible for how customers get into contact with the bank on a large scale, working on an application landscape that supports over thirty thousand customer calls every day. Think of, for example, continuously improving our voicebot to better serve our customers when they call us, using a combination of traditional Natural Language Processing and Generative AI-based features.

   Create an Impact
     * "The end-user is always number one!" In the back of your head, you're always keeping this in mind. You strive to come up with ways to continuously achieve the objectives of the Rabobank;
     * You use the latest development technologies and would love to share your stack with us. You're constantly eager to experiment with- and learn new techniques;
     * Together with the team (DevOps, Product Owner, Business Analyst, UX designer, Scrum Master and architect) you'll devise practical solutions. You'll have an active role in participating in technical discussion where you may give your input or advice to the rest of the team;
     * You don't mind picking up test-automation and test-management activities;
     * You ensure that we continuously improve in terms of code quality and architecture.
     * You have fun in everything you do!

   Your Skills includes:

   To be considered for this role, you must at least have demonstratable experience with:
     * CI/ CD Pipelines (Azure DevOps, including biceps)
     * MS Azure
     * MS Power Virtual Agents / Copilot Studio

   Nice to have:
     * MS Power Automate
     * MS Speech Services
     * Azure DevOps
     * Azure networking & security
     * Dynatrace
     * Splunk
     * Nexus IQ
     * Sonar
     * AudioCodes
     * Understanding on Genesys Cloud or other CCAAS-application capabilities
     * AWS
     * Cyber ARK
     * Checkmarx
     * Kong platformMicro services
     * SM9
job_details.full_text:
Conversational AI Developer

In the role of Conversational AI developer you're part of a team that strives for the best customer-experience in online banking contact. You'll be part of an environment that heavily focusses on innovation by means of cutting-edge technologies, such as Generative AI! Together, you'll be responsible for how customers get into contact with the bank on a large scale, working on an application landscape that supports over thirty thousand customer calls every day. Think of, for example, continuously improving our voicebot to better serve our customers when they call us, using a combination of traditional Natural Language Processing and Generative AI-based features.

   Create an Impact
     * "The end-user is always number one!" In the back of your head, you're always keeping this in mind. You strive to come up with ways to continuously achieve the objectives of the Rabobank;
     * You use the latest development technologies and would love to share your stack with us. You're constantly eager to experiment with- and learn new techniques;
     * Together with the team (DevOps, Product Owner, Business Analyst, UX designer, Scrum Master and architect) you'll devise practical solutions. You'll have an active role in participating in technical discussion where you may give your input or advice to the rest of the team;
     * You don't mind picking up test-automation and test-management activities;
     * You ensure that we continuously improve in terms of code quality and architecture.
     * You have fun in everything you do!

   Your Skills includes:

   To be considered for this role, you must at least have demonstratable experience with:
     * CI/ CD Pipelines (Azure DevOps, including biceps)
     * MS Azure
     * MS Power Virtual Agents / Copilot Studio

   Nice to have:
     * MS Power Automate
     * MS Speech Services
     * Azure DevOps
     * Azure networking & security
     * Dynatrace
     * Splunk
     * Nexus IQ
     * Sonar
     * AudioCodes
     * Understanding on Genesys Cloud or other CCAAS-application capabilities
     * AWS
     * Cyber ARK
     * Checkmarx
     * Kong platformMicro services
     * SM9

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes the use of Generative AI, specifically mentioning "Generative AI-based features" and "voicebot" improvements. It also highlights building and maintaining production-grade systems that handle a large scale of customer interactions daily. The core responsibilities involve developing conversational AI solutions, which aligns with the definition of a GenAI Engineer focusing on language models and user-facing applications. While there's mention of traditional NLP, the explicit focus on Generative AI and building conversational interfaces points towards this profile over an ML Engineer.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'strives for the best customer-experience in online banking contact' and 'continuously achieve the objectives of the Rabobank' indicates an understanding of business goals and customer needs.
job_tasks.phrase: strives for the best customer-experience in online banking contact

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'continuously achieve the objectives of the Rabobank' shows alignment with business goals.

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'voicebot to better serve our customers' and 'Generative AI-based features' directly relates to developing and improving AI models for conversational tasks.
job_tasks.phrase: continuously improving our voicebot to better serve our customers

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'using a combination of traditional Natural Language Processing and Generative AI-based features' indicates work on AI models, including generative ones.
job_tasks.phrase: traditional Natural Language Processing and Generative AI-based features

job_tasks.justification: The role involves working on an 'application landscape that supports over thirty thousand customer calls every day', implying the development and maintenance of production-grade software systems.
job_tasks.phrase: application landscape that supports over thirty thousand customer calls every day

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'devise practical solutions' and the mention of working with a team including DevOps, Product Owner, Business Analyst, UX designer, Scrum Master and architect suggests building and integrating software.
The mention of 'Micro services' indicates a software development architecture.
The explicit mention of 'CI/ CD Pipelines (Azure DevOps, including biceps)' is a direct indicator of MLOps practices.
job_tasks.phrase: CI/ CD Pipelines (Azure DevOps, including biceps)

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'test-automation and test-management activities' falls under the operational aspects of ensuring software quality and deployment.
The statement 'ensure that we continuously improve in terms of code quality and architecture' relates to maintaining and improving production systems.
job_tasks.phrase: continuously improve in terms of code quality and architecture
